description: ESLint configuration file that extends Next.js core web vitals and TypeScript settings using the FlatCompat utility for configuration compatibility.

methods.name: dirname
methods.description: Returns the directory name of a path.

methods.name: fileURLToPath
methods.description: Converts a file URL to a path.

methods.name: compat.extends
methods.description: Extends configuration presets in ESLint compatible configuration.
